channel.title: CVE Feed for Advantech -- WebAccess SCADA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Advantech -- WebAccess SCADA

item.title: CVE-2021-38431|2024-09-16T18:28:58.187Z -- advantech -- webaccess%20scada
item.description: An authenticated user using Advantech WebAccess SCADA in versions 9.0.3 and prior can use API functions to disclose project names and paths from other users.
